name: SuperGenPass for Windows Phone
tagline: Port of mobile version of SuperGenPass to WP8
body:
### Description.
Hi. For myself, I wrote a port on the SGP WP8. I think it will be useful to you :)

### Installing
1. Download .xap from github. Or download it from Windows Store.
2. Install it by Developer Utils from WP SDK.
3. ???
4. PROFIT!

### Authors
* Kernel(me) – Porting SGP3 to WP8.

***

* [ChrisSGP](http://discuss.supergenpass.com/template/NamlServlet.jtp?macro=user_nodes&user=86496)  Author of SGP Bookmarklet.

***

* Paul Johnston – [JavaScript implementation of MD5](http://pajhome.org.uk/crypt/md5/).
* Nic Wolff – [Original bookmarklet password generator](http://www.angel.net/~nic/).

### Support or Contact
All contacts are on my [personal page](http://kern0.ru).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
